headline: Seagate Announces Final Results of Exchange Offers and Consent Solicitations for Senior Notes
summary: FREMONT, Calif., June 27, 2025--Seagate Technology Holdings plc ("Seagate") (NASDAQ: STX) today announced the final results of the previously announced (i) offers to certain Eligible Holders (as defined below) to exchange (each, an "Exchange Offer" and collectively, the "Exchange Offers") any and all outstanding notes of the following eight series issued by Seagate HDD Cayman ("Seagate HDD") (the "Old Notes") for new notes to be issued by Seagate Data Storage Technology Pte. Ltd. ("SDST") (the "
